txt.en: Increases the number of targets affected by your War-chant skill by 1.\nDecreases the cooldown of Block & Parry Response Skills by 1s\n+20% War-chant Range

Increases the number of targets affected by your War-chant skill by 4.\nDecreases the cooldown of Block & Parry Response Skills by 4s\n+80% War-chant Range
